sources.title: The Blitz (The Rotterdam Bombing) | Full Movie | World War 2 Drama Romance
sources.description:
The Blitz (The Rotterdam Bombing) - In 1940, a struggling poor young man falls for a girl who must pay a terrible price to save her mentally disabled brother by marrying a powerful shrewd businessman. Then Rotterdam Blitz, a devastating German bombardment, begins. 
2012.  Stars: Jan Smit, Roos van Erkel, Mike Weerts
